body.p: During NVM Express read operations, the Data Manager will request the allocation of a Data Frame buffer from the Buffer Manager and free the Data Frame buffer when it is no longer needed. During NVM Express write operations, the Data Manager will allocate the Data Frame buffers, but ownership of the buffers will pass to the FTL when the WriteReq is issued. It is then the responsibility of the FTL to free the Data Frame buffer when it is no longer required.
